# BugSplat

## BugSplat

- [Welcome](https://docs.bugsplat.com/readme): Technical documentation, platform integration guides, crash reporting best practices, and other useful information from BugSplat.  We're excited you're here!
- [Getting Started](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started)
- [Signing Up](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/signing-up-for-an-account-with-bugsplat)
- [Creating a Database](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/create-a-new-database-in-bugsplat)
- [Platform Integrations](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations)
- [Desktop](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/desktop)
- [BugSplat Crash Reporting Library for Windows (Native C++)](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/desktop/cplusplus)
- [Full Memory Dumps](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/desktop/cplusplus/full-memory-dumps)
- [Windows (Native C++) Dependencies](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/desktop/cplusplus/dependencies)
- [Windows (.NET Framework)](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/desktop/windows-dot-net-framework)
- [macOS](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/desktop/macos)
- [Linux](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/desktop/linux)
- [Cross-Platform](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform)
- [.NET Standard](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/dot-net-standard)
- [Breakpad (Deprecated)](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/breakpad)
- [Crashpad](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/crashpad)
- [How to Build Google Crashpad](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/crashpad/how-to-build-google-crashpad)
- [Deno](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/deno)
- [Electron](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/electron)
- [Java](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/java)
- [Node.js](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/node.js)
- [Python](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/python)
- [Qt](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/cross-platform/qt)
- [Game Development](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development)
- [CRYENGINE](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development/cryengine)
- [Nintendo Switch](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development/nintendo)
- [PlayStation](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development/playstation): Process PS4 and PS5 crash reports with BugSplat. Available for certified PlayStation developers, our SDK enhances game stability
- [Unreal Engine](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development/unreal-engine)
- [Unreal Engine Plugin](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development/unreal-engine/unreal-engine-plugin)
- [Unity](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development/unity)
- [Xbox](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/game-development/xbox): Integrate BugSplat for crash reporting in Xbox games (Series X, S, One). Our SDK supports GDK and GDKX projects, helping certified developers enhance game stability.
- [Mobile](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/mobile)
- [Android](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/mobile/android)
- [Ionic](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/mobile/ionic)
- [iOS](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/mobile/ios)
- [React Native](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/mobile/react-native)
- [Web](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/web)
- [Angular](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/web/angular)
- [JavaScript](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/web/javascript)
- [React](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/web/react)
- [Vue](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/web/vue)
- [Downloads](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/integrations/downloads): Direct links to platform downloads.  Note that all links can also be found in their platform specific document.
- [Platform Samples](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/posting-a-test-crash)
- [myConsoleCrasher (C++)](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/posting-a-test-crash/myconsolecrasher-c-plus-plus): Testing Windows Native C++ crashes with the sample application ‘myConsoleCrasher’
- [Address Sanitizer Reports](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/posting-a-test-crash/myconsolecrasher-c-plus-plus/address-sanitizer-reports)
- [Inviting Team Members](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/adding-uses-to-your-account)
- [Importing Crashes](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/migrating-crashes-from-another-tool)
- [Troubleshooting](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/troubleshooting): BugSplat helps troubleshoot crash reporting issues, including why crashes are rejected, such as exceeding size limits or frequent submissions.
- [Quickly Submitting Your First Crash in Under 5 Minutes](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/getting-started/quickly-submitting-your-first-crash-in-under-5-minutes)
- [Development](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development)

- [Azure DevOps](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/integrating-with-tools/issue-trackers/azure-devops)

- [Jira](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/integrating-with-tools/issue-trackers/jira)

- [GitLab](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/integrating-with-tools/issue-trackers/gitlab)
- [Monday.com](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/integrating-with-tools/issue-trackers/monday)

- [API](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services)
- [Web Application Endpoints](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api)
- [Charting](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/charting): API Documentation for the BugSplat Charting Endpoints
- [Company](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/company): API Documentation for the BugSplat Company Endpoint
- [Crash](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/crash): API Documentation for the BugSplat Crashes Endpoint
- [Crashes](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/crashes): API Documentation for the BugSplat Crashes Endpoint
- [Crash Groups](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/crash-groups): API Documentation for various endpoints related to BugSplat Crash Groups
- [Databases](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/databases): API Documentation for the BugSplat Databases Endpoint
- [Defect](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/defect): API Documentation for the BugSplat Defect Endpoint
- [Events](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/events): API Documentation for the BugSplat Events Endpoint
- [Import/Migrate](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/import-migrate): API Documentation for the BugSplat Crashes Endpoint
- [Support Response](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/support-response): API Documentation for the BugSplat Support Response Endpoints
- [User (GDPR)](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/user-gdpr): API Documentation for the BugSplat User (GDPR) Endpoint
- [Users](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/users): API Documentation for the BugSplat Users Endpoint
- [Versions](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/api/versions): API Documentation for the BugSplat Versions Endpoint
- [Crash Post Endpoints](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/crash)
- [OAuth2](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/oauth2)
- [Defect Tracker Options](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/defect-tracker-options): To create or update a defect tracker integration, use the following endpoint.

- [Platform Specific API's](https://docs.bugsplat.com/introduction/development/web-services/platform-specific-apis)

- [How-Tos](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos)
- [Creating Defects](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/creating-a-defect)
- [Contacting End-Users](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/contacting-users)
- [Crash Dialog Branding](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/customize-the-crash-dialog)
- [Reprocess Crashes](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/reprocessing-crashes): BugSplat can reprocess crashes that were processed incorrectly due to missing symbols, mismatched symbols, or errors during initial processing.
- [Batch Reprocess Crashes](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/batch-reprocess-crashes): Learn how to batch reprocess multiple reports with BugSplat and easily apply updated symbols or grouping rules to your crashes or errors.
- [Using the Crash Attribute Feature](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/using-the-crash-attribute-feature)
- [Send Feedback](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/sending-feedback)
- [Remove Crashes](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/how-tos/remove-crashes): Remove mistakes and other clutter by deleting crashes in your BugSplat database.
- [Videos](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/videos): We're building our library of instructional videos to help you get the most out of your BugSplat account.
- [BugSplat Product Walkthrough](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/videos/bugsplat-product-walkthrough): Take three minutes to get an overview of the ways that the BugSplat web app can help you find and fix bugs in your application.
- [FAQs](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq)
- [How Do I Upload Crashes with Python?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-do-i-upload-crashes-with-python)
- [How Do I Remove Symbol Files?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-do-i-remove-symbol-files)
- [Crash details 'Active Thread'](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/crash-details-active-thread)
- [How long does it take to process a crash?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-long-does-it-take-to-process-a-crash)
- [How BugSplat handles large crash volumes](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-bugsplat-handles-large-crash-volumes)
- [How Does Crash Rate Limiting Work?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-does-crash-rate-limiting-work)
- [Add Custom Branding to Support Response](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/add-custom-branding-to-support-response): BugSplat allows users to customize support messages with their branding and create unique support responses for different crash types, increasing the likelihood of successful troubleshooting.
- [Finding Missing Reports](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/finding-missing-reports)
- [Using Dark Mode](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/using-dark-mode)
- [What If My App or Game Grows Quickly?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/what-if-my-app-or-game-grows-quickly)
- [Does BugSplat have an effect on application performance?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/does-bugsplat-have-an-effect-on-application-performance)
- [Manually Upload Crash Reports to BugSplat](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/manually-post-crash-reports-to-bugsplat)
- [How to configure proxy settings in BugSplat](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-to-configure-proxy-settings-in-bugsplat)
- [Using BugSplat's public database](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/using-bugsplats-public-database)
- [How to Upload Symbol Files with Symbol-Upload](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-to-upload-symbol-files-with-symbol-upload)
- [Using SendPdbs to Automatically Upload Symbol Files](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/using-sendpdbs-to-automatically-upload-symbol-files)
- [Managing Symbol Space](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/managing-symbol-space)
- [Why Group Crashes?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-and-why-to-group-crashes)
- [Uploading third-party DLLs without PDB files](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/uploading-third-party-dlls-without-pdb-files)
- [Localized Support Responses for Windows C++, .NET, and macOS](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/localized-support-responses-for-windows-c++-.net-and-macos)
- [BugSplat application uptime data](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/bugsplat-application-uptime-data)
- [What are the upload size considerations with BugSplat accounts.](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/bugsplat-application-uptime-data/what-are-the-upload-size-considerations-with-bugsplat-accounts.)
- [Is an application's source code safe when using BugSplat?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/is-an-applications-source-code-safe-when-using-bugsplat)
- [How to get correct callstacks with BugSplat in Steam](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/how-to-get-correct-callstacks-with-bugsplat-in-steam)
- [What is a crash reporter?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/what-is-a-crash-reporter): A crash reporter like BugSplat is a software program that captures the state of a software application at the time of a crash to help developers understand and fix the underlying issue.
- [Common End-User Questions](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/common-end-user-questions)
- [Missing BugSplat.dll](https://docs.bugsplat.com/education/faq/common-end-user-questions/missing-bugsplat-dll)

- [Updates to BugSplat Pricing Plans - March 2024](https://docs.bugsplat.com/administration/billing/plans-upgrades-and-payments-faq/updates-to-bugsplat-pricing-plans-march-2024)

- [What is BugSplat?](https://docs.bugsplat.com/about/what-is-bugsplat): BugSplat is the developer's go-to toolbox for finding, understanding, and fixing crashes.
